application.name: H.264 Endoscopy Tool Tracking Distributed
tags: **endoscopy** ##### explanation: **secondary category**: video directly relates to the core H.264 stream processing and real-time video overlay features. **keywords**: "endoscopic tool tracking" captures the surgical domain specificity not covered by categories "distributed ucx pipeline" highlights the inter fragment communication architecture using :10000 ports **tags**: *h.264*: core codec for video stream handling *holoviz hdr*: visualization component with overlay fusion *lstm model zoo*: inference engine implementation detail *tensorrt*: acceleration framework critical to latency optimization *endoscopy*: medical imaging domain specialization

data.name: Holoscan Sample App Data for AI-based Endoscopy Tool Tracking
data.description: This resource contains the convolutional LSTM model for tool tracking in laparoscopic videos by Nwoye et. al [1], and a sample surgical video.
